channel.title: Awesome Ant Killer
channel.description:
Ok simple tutorial
DISCLAIMER: I am not responsible for anything that happens to you, your pets, your clothes, or any of your other belongings, before, during, or after this tutorial
Steps: 1. Mix 1 part bleach to 3 parts sugar [optional] 2. Mix in food coloring to let people know its poisonis [optional] 3. Mix in something that makes it not smell like bleach (REALLY IMPROVES IT)
Your Done! Yep it was that easy!
[EDIT] Forgot to say... Another one, completly made by me!

item.title: Awesome Ant Killer
item.dc:creator: @gikid gikid
item.description:
@gikid wrote:

Ok simple tutorial

DISCLAIMER: I am not responsible for anything that happens to you, your pets, your clothes, or any of your other belongings, before, during, or after this tutorial

Steps:

  1. Mix 1 part bleach to 3 parts sugar
    [optional] 2. Mix in food coloring to let people know its poisonis
    [optional] 3. Mix in something that makes it not smell like bleach (REALLY IMPROVES IT)

Your Done! Yep it was that easy!

[EDIT] Forgot to say… Another one, completly made by me!
